001package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.annotations;
002
003import java.lang.annotation.ElementType;
004import java.lang.annotation.Retention;
005import java.lang.annotation.RetentionPolicy;
006import java.lang.annotation.Target;
007
008/**
009 * Annotation for intercepting network requests during UI automation tests.
010 *
011 * <p>This annotation is used on test methods to specify a list of request URL substrings
012 * that should be intercepted and monitored during execution. It is particularly useful
013 * for verifying API calls made by the UI, debugging network interactions, and applying
014 * request modifications.
015 *
016 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
017 */
018@Retention(RetentionPolicy.RUNTIME)
019@Target(ElementType.METHOD)
020public @interface InterceptRequests {
021
022   /**
023    * Specifies an array of request URL substrings to intercept.
024    *
025    * <p>Any request made by the UI that contains one of these substrings
026    * will be intercepted during the test execution.
027    *
028    * @return An array of substrings representing parts of request URLs to intercept.
029    */
030   String[] requestUrlSubStrings() default {};
031}
